title: KERATIN RESEARCH Brazilian Keratin Hair Blowout Treatment Professional Results Straightening and Smoothing Hair with Thermal Protection argan Oil Spray Queratina Keratina (THERMAL PROTECTOR)
features: Superior heat protection for your hair. Withstands heat up to 450ºF. apply it prior to using high heat styling tools. Vegan formula. Not tested on animals
Weightless formula. Suitable for all hair types. Infused with Moroccan Argan Oil, Collagen Amino Acids, Keratin Amino acids and shine-boosting ingredients.
Eliminates frizz. Ads shine. Soften your hair. Reduces the amount of time it takes to blow dry hair up to 50%. Just spray into towel-dried hair and comb through. Blow dry with brush that's all

Helps in making the hair easier to smooth and straighten with less effort. Resulting in flawless silky, smooth hair with less heat and less damage. Can be used daily. Avoids detangling and helps styling with ease.

A must have product for every hair stylist. Curl refresher, eliminate frizz and ads shine Thermal Heat Protector Hair Spray Enhances shine, Eliminates Frizz, Detangles Hair, protects hair from High heat, Ease on Styling prevents split ends Replenishes hair Nutrients
